Class WarGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • WarGame

  • public class WarGame
extends Object
    WarGame class used with WarGui for War card game with graphical interface

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarGame(WarCardPlayer play1, WarCardPlayer play2)
      WarGame constructor uses WarCardPlayer Objects for determining card values and winnings

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private int determineWarWinner()
      determineWarWinner method determines the winner of a war.
      Card getPlayer1Card()
      getPlayer1Card gets the last card that Player 1 played
      Card getPlayer2Card()
      getPlayer2Card gets the last card that Player 2 played
      boolean isWar()
      isWar method determines if there is a war based on the last played card of player 1 and player 2
      void play()
      play method plays a card from each player's hand

      war method simulates the actions taken when a war occurs (the extra cards played).

    • Constructor Detail

      • WarGame

        public WarGame(WarCardPlayer play1,
       WarCardPlayer play2)
        WarGame constructor uses WarCardPlayer Objects for determining card values and winnings
        Parameters:
        play1 - Player one of the game (a WarCardPlayer Object)
        play2 - Player two of the game (a WarCardPlayer Object)

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        play method plays a card from each player's hand

      • getPlayer1Card

        public Card getPlayer1Card()
        getPlayer1Card gets the last card that Player 1 played
        Returns:
        The Card Object last played by Player 1

      • getPlayer2Card

        public Card getPlayer2Card()
        getPlayer2Card gets the last card that Player 2 played
        Returns:
        The Card Object last played by Player 1

      • winner

        public int winner()
        winner method determines the winner of a hand based on last card played
        Returns:
        1 if player 1 wins, -1 if player 2 wins.

      • war

        public int war()
        war method simulates the actions taken when a war occurs (the extra cards played). Then the winner is determined
        Returns:
        1 is player 1 won -1 is player 2 won

      • determineWarWinner

        private int determineWarWinner()
        determineWarWinner method determines the winner of a war.
        Returns:
        1 is player 1 wins -1 is player 2 wins

      • isWar

        public boolean isWar()
        isWar method determines if there is a war based on the last played card of player 1 and player 2
        Returns:
        boolean true if the result is a war.
